body:
On master (f94784f5bcfd0adf5d20f9631cde454348b4ff71) and 23.x branches some GUIX artifacts for `x86_64` and `arm64` macOS have indistinguishable names:
```
d34646cbaf05e03195eb1e426f72fb471fe2d87ab18c9a656600089597703a38  bitcoin-23.0rc2-arm64-apple-darwin.tar.gz
968767b39442e179e5976b948112a0904374eb4cfb9cba22863408a70a1d99f9  bitcoin-23.0rc2-osx-unsigned.dmg
d8a7037d5bb845a214e45a52abcf9119bfbe72a76d6370e9560c18fda74a70db  bitcoin-23.0rc2-osx-unsigned.tar.gz
71092f37985d556bdd25d33fb8571e13664eacadda90efcf21eaa1ba8a32eabd  bitcoin-23.0rc2-osx-unsigned.dmg
cb10c49b486085b89393955a7a168c32e2f2a4911f2b8d44494bd8f2bd0acf2f  bitcoin-23.0rc2-osx-unsigned.tar.gz
6d4c44726cd45711c4cb7257c6b46731be1446fc85e79ac86f2def19be45ced3  bitcoin-23.0rc2-osx64.tar.gz
```

With this PR:
```
b4525e4d89687f65fdca9b5e344a76655152163e26e9e2cc5f1ad232e2dc85d3  bitcoin-933a43018f0f-arm64-apple-darwin-unsigned.dmg
80da8d4cfdeb18815a4d42284d8677da4c9817565c03aca1b8985500f7aa71c6  bitcoin-933a43018f0f-arm64-apple-darwin-unsigned.tar.gz
1bbe53a04c3a3dfbcc09416aff6a8864cb54ddd740b36b27c7923e8a5ee51215  bitcoin-933a43018f0f-arm64-apple-darwin.tar.gz
8ebf6a5f57def13c9f2350a9f82c6723bc1268c1ce138ab2d1679cf4b48c0709  bitcoin-933a43018f0f-x86_64-apple-darwin-unsigned.dmg
35029c6aea254e2b68ab52b266a431835dc5fc63b640ab6a376865bb90e4754d  bitcoin-933a43018f0f-x86_64-apple-darwin-unsigned.tar.gz
11fead388020da51e4ae2ac442d70d97250f8eb50e71ae9d5629ae91b2aa332c  bitcoin-933a43018f0f-x86_64-apple-darwin.tar.gz
```
title: guix: Use $HOST instead of generic osx{64} for macOS artifacts
